title: Tell me about a problem you experienced while recycling.

korean: 얼마 전에 분리수거하다가 좀 당황한 적이 있어.
치킨을 시켜 먹었는데 포장 용기를 어떻게 버려야 할지 몰랐어.
플라스틱인 것 같기도 하고 종이인 것 같기도 하고.
인터넷 검색해봤는데, 재질에 따라 다르게 버려야 한대.
결국 용기를 자세히 보고 표시를 확인했어.
또 한번은 큰 박스를 버리려는데 규격이 안 맞았어.
접어서 묶어야 하는데 너무 커서 힘들었어.
결국 칼로 잘라서 작게 만들어 버렸어.
가끔 분리수거 날짜를 깜빡해서 놓칠 때도 있어.
그럼 일주일을 더 기다려야 하니까 불편해.
앱으로 분리수거 날짜 알림 설정해 놨는데도 가끔 까먹어.
english: A while ago, I was a bit flustered while recycling.
I ordered chicken and didn't know how to throw away the packaging container.
It seemed like plastic or maybe paper.
I searched online, and apparently you have to throw it away differently depending on the material.
Eventually I looked closely at the container and checked the marking.
Another time, I tried to throw away a big box but it didn't meet the size requirements.
I had to fold and tie it, but it was too big so it was difficult.
Eventually I cut it with a knife to make it smaller and threw it away.
Sometimes I forget the recycling day and miss it.
Then it's inconvenient because I have to wait another week.
Even though I set recycling day notifications on the app, I sometimes forget.
I thought I should pay more attention.
